product_name: O'Neill Bahia Long-Sleeve Short Spring Wetsuit - Women's
long_description: Designed by women for women, the women's O'Neill Bahia Long-Sleeve Short Spring Wetsuit offers light insulation for the style-savvy paddler. 2/1mm designation means that the body and sleeves of the suit are made of 2mm neoprene and 1mm neoprene, respectively, appropriate for water play in mild water temperatures. Stretchy 2/1mm neoprene forms to your shape for a flexible, comfortable fit, and it protects skin from harmful UV light with a UPF rating of 50+. Paneling and flatlock seams are designed to work with a paddler's movements, reducing overall wear and chafing. Fully adjustable, watertight collar helps keep the chill out. Offset teeth on interlocking back zipper prevent water from seeping through. Stash small items in the rear right-side pocket. Hand wash the women's O'Neill Bahia Long-Sleeve Short Spring Wetsuit in cold water, drip dry out of sun and store in a cool, dry place.
short_description: Designed by women for women, the women's O'Neill Bahia Long-Sleeve Short Spring Wetsuit offers light insulation for the style-savvy paddler.
